mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point (member_id, balance, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{balance}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE point SET balance = #{balance}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
UPDATE point SET balance = balance - #{amount}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
UPDATE point SET balance = balance + #{amount}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
